lead_paragraph: Billionaire investor Carl Icahn pledged $20 million on Thursday to keep Atlantic City's Taj Mahal casino open indefinitely, eliminating a plan to shut it down Saturday.

headline.main: Icahn Promises Taj Mahal Casino $20M to Stay Open
headline.print_headline: Icahn Promises Taj Mahal Casino $20M to Stay Open
